PSCT.Base: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 2 "Dragon Tokens" (Dragon/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0), also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Level 5 or higher Dragon monsters. You can only use this effect of "Wish Dragon" once per turn.
